summary: Ryu, Dhalsim and Vega are sent out to stop M. Bison. They befriend a teenage school student and seek out Bison. Bison sends out his own soliders, Ken and Sagat.
cast: Andy Lau|Jacky Cheung|Aaron Kwok|Chingmy Yau|Dicky Cheung|Simon Yam|Ekin Cheng|Winnie Lau|Charlie Yeung|Andy Chi-On Hui|Ken Lo|Billy Chow|Dennis Chan|Richard Ng|King-Tan Yuen|Pak-Cheung Chan|Hon Chi Lai|Dave Ching Lam|William Wai-Lun Duen|Siu-Kei Lee|Fanny Leung|Choi-Chow Hoh|Fu-Wai Lam|Siu Chung Mok
title: Future Cops
